translations.translation: Again curse him, how he considered!
May be then be accursed, how he plotted!
Again, ruin seize him, how did he hatch a scheme?
What an evil plan he has made!
Again accursed be he, how evilly did he decide!
And once more let him be cursed, how he plotted!
Again, may he be cursed how he plotted;
Again, death seize him, how he determined!
Again (self-)destroyed is he, how he planned! -
Let him be destroyed. How he calculated!
And again perish he! How maliciously he devised!
Again, perish he, how he decided!
Yea, Woe to him; How he plotted!-
And once more let him be cursed, how he plotted!
Again, death seized him, how was his determining!
Again: may he perish, how he analyzed.
Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
[74:20] Again, perish he, how he decided!
(Again (self) destroyed is he) again cursed is he, (how he planned!) his saying about Muhammad (pbuh)

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ثُمَّ قُتِلَ } ذلك المعاند الطاغي { كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ } [المدثر: 20] ما هو بعيد عن شأن القرآن بمراحل؟! كرره سبحانه مبالغةً في التعجب والاستبعاد
